entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have managed to survive this far but you have yet to complete your primary and secondary missions.
entries.journal_entry_description: Descend into the research facility to carry out your mission.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Find a command console to see if you can locate the cryogenics laboratory.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Repairing these damaged systems will make your job much easier. Repair the systems and use the console to find the cryogenics laboratory.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Reactivate important systems and use the console to find the cryogenics laboratory.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Some damaged systems are draining too much power. Reconfigure them so non-damaged systems will work properly.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Find the cyrogenics laboratory using the console
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Install the damage control module in the proper system.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Install the communications module in the proper system.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Find the damage control information systems module that something ripped out of the damage control systems computer.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Something ripped out, then walked off with, the communication module. Kill undead in the area to see if they have the module.
entries.task11_comm_message_text: [Klex Fulgor] You're going to needs some parts to repair that thing. Oh well, good luck. Hahaha.
